title: Jordanians Seek Retribution After ISIS' Burning Of Captured Pilot
teaser: There is an appetite for revenge in Jordan after an ISIS video showed a captured Jordanian pilot being burned to death in a cage. NPR's Arun Rath talks with correspondent Peter Kenyon in Amman.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
